meanings.definition: Relating to, or characteristic of a city or town.
meanings.sent1: The tall buildings in the urban area create a bustling atmosphere.
meanings.sent2: I prefer the urban lifestyle with its convenience and excitement.
meanings.sent3: The urban pigeons seem to have their own daily routine in the city.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was an urban jungle, filled with thoughts and ideas competing for attention.
meanings.sent5: The urban landscape was a patchwork of lights and shadows, painting a picture of city life.

meanings.definition: In, relating to, or characteristic of a city or town.
meanings.sent1: The urban environment can be both fast-paced and diverse.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed exploring the urban areas, discovering new shops and cafes.
meanings.sent3: The urban traffic seemed to have a mind of its own, causing chaos at every turn.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts were like an urban maze, twisting and turning with no clear path.
meanings.sent5: The urban soundscape was a symphony of car horns, chatter, and music, blending into a unique melody.

meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or located in a city.
meanings.sent1: The urban population continues to grow as more people move to cities.
meanings.sent2: Living in an urban setting offers a different lifestyle compared to rural areas.
meanings.sent3: The urban architecture showcased a blend of modern and historic styles.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were like an urban landscape, constantly changing and evolving.
meanings.sent5: The urban skyline was a mix of skyscrapers and old buildings, creating a unique silhouette.
